tool_description: Generate words for Charades and Pictionary Games!

api_list.name: Get Charades Word
api_list.description: Retrieve a random charades word based on the specified difficulty level. If no difficulty is provided, a random difficulty will be selected.

optional_parameters.name: difficulty
optional_parameters.description: The difficulty level of the word. Options may include easy, medium, hard.

api_list.name: Get Pictionary Word
api_list.description: Retrieve a random Pictionary word based on the specified difficulty level. If no difficulty is provided, a random difficulty will be selected.

optional_parameters.name: difficulty
optional_parameters.description: The difficulty level of the word. Options may include easy, medium, hard.
